scripts.build:slim: npm run build:fast && npx purgecss --css 'build/static/css/*.css' --content 'build/**/*.html' 'build/static/js/*.js' --output build/static/css/ && npm run compress
scripts.fix:jsx-attrs: find src -type f \( -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.js" \) -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i -E 's/\bclass=/className=/g; s/<label([^>]*) for=/<label\1 htmlFor=/g; s/\btabindex=/tabIndex=/gi; s/\bmaxlength=/maxLength=/gi; s/\bautocomplete=/autoComplete=/gi; s/\bcolspan=/colSpan=/gi; s/\browspan=/rowSpan=/gi; s/\bframeborder=/frameBorder=/gi; s/\ballowfullscreen=/allowFullScreen=/gi'
scripts.fix: npm run fix:jsx-attrs && npm run fix:imports && npm run format
scripts.fix:auto: node scripts/fix-project.js && node scripts/fix-index-html.js && npm run format
scripts.analyze: npm run build:ci && npx source-map-explorer 'build/static/js/*.js' --html analyze.html || true
scripts.purge:report: npm run build:ci && npx purgecss --css 'build/static/css/*.css' --content 'build/**/*.html' 'build/static/js/*.js' --rejected --stdout > purge-report.txt || true
scripts.compress: find build -type f \( -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' -o -name '*.html' \) -print0 | xargs -0 -I{} bash -lc "gzip -kf9 '{}' || true; brotli -kf '{}' || true"
scripts.fix:img-lazy: find src -type f \( -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.js" \) -print0 | xargs -0 sed -i -E 's/]*)(?//g'
scripts.start:preview: npm run build:slim && npx --yes serve -s build -l 3000
